ygData.subject: Re: AE spells
ygData.msgSnippet: why don t you try it. i ve done it while in my group and my health along with someone elses health went down ... From: Karl Hatteland
ygData.messageBody:
why don't you try it. i've done it while in my group and my health along
with someone elses health went down
-----Original Message-----
From: Karl Hatteland <karlh@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Saturday, May 22, 1999 7:20 PM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] AE spells


>From: "Karl Hatteland" <karlh@...>
>
>No only your self will be hurt.
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Neil Lambert <smartass@...>
>To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
>Date: Sunday, May 23, 1999 1:51 AM
>Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] AE spells
>
>
>>From: "Neil Lambert" <smartass@...>
>>
>>actually you're wrong. Icestrike is a good example. if you cast icestrike
>on
>>yourself, EVERYONE around you will be hurt, including
>>-PvP peopple
>>
>>
>>-----Original Message-----
>>From: shypht <evanschu@...>
>>To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
>>Date: Saturday, May 22, 1999 3:20 PM
>>Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] AE spells
>>
>>
>>>From: "shypht" <evanschu@...>
>>>
>>>If you are a non-PvP server and all -PvP, you do not need to worry about
>>>hurting other party members.
>>>BUT, using AE spells is dangerous anyways, if you cast it on a mob that
>has
>>>no hate for the tanks yet,
>>>you are bound to get them onto you.
>>>
>>>But, as for the use of AE spells and how they are good.
>>>
>>>- Lets take the lvl 24 Column of Lightning spell, 130 mana, does 130
>damage
>>>to the mobs around it.
>>>- Lets say there are 2 mobs, you cast that, for the cost of 130 mana you
>do
>>>260 damage(130 per mob).
>>>
>>>That is nice damage / mana ratio no? .. but you need to make sure your
>>tanks
>>>are building up hate on all the monsters before you start to use AE
>spells.
>>>I just like to stick to my lower lvl DD spells when in groups.
>>>
>>>-----Original Message-----
>>>From: MAD Iguana <wargod@...>
>>>To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
>>>Date: Saturday, May 22, 1999 6:00 PM
>>>Subject: [eq_wizards] AE spells
>>>
>>>
>>>>From: MAD Iguana <wargod@...>
>>>>
>>>>I really don't see how AE spells are useful at all. The only way I can
>>see
>>>>it being useful is if I root a group of mobs close together, but how
>often
>>>>does that happen? If i am in a party and the tanks are fighting a group
>>of
>>>>mobs, the AE spell will hit my party members too so what is the point?
>>Can
>>>>anyone enlighten me here, maybe I am missing something. Thanks.
>>>>
>>>>
>>>>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>>>>What was YOUR favorite part?!
>>>>http://www.onelist.com
>>>>Tell other Star Wars fans at ONElist!
>>>>
>>>
